title: location
description: A Location represents a geographic location.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `location`.

name.description: A name used to identify the Location.

description.description: A textual description of the Location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the Location in decimal degrees.

longitude.description: The longitude of the Location in decimal degrees.

precision.description: Defines the precision of the coordinates specified by the latitude and longitude properties, measured in meters.

region.description: The region that this Location describes. This property SHOULD contain a value from region-ov.

country.description: The country that this Location describes.

administrative_area.description: The state, province, or other sub-national administrative area that this Location describes.

city.description: The city that this Location describes.

street_address.description: The street address that this Location describes.

postal_code.description: The postal code for this Location.
